Andhra Pradesh.intro: Andhra Pradesh Medical Services Recruitment Board (APMSRB) has given an employment notification for the recruitment of Civil Assistant Surgeon Specialist & General Vacancy on Regular Basis. Those Candidates who are interested in the vacancy details & completed all eligibility criteria can read the Notification & Apply Online.
Andhra Pradesh.contentHtml:
Name of the Post: APMSRB Civil Assistant Surgeon 2024 Online Form

Post Date: 10-12-2024

Total Vacancy: 97

Brief Information: Andhra Pradesh Medical Services Recruitment Board (APMSRB) has given an employment notification for the recruitment of Civil Assistant Surgeon Specialist & General Vacancy on Regular Basis. Those Candidates who are interested in the vacancy details & completed all eligibility criteria can read the Notification & Apply Online.

Andhra Pradesh Medical Services Recruitment Board (APMSRB)

Advt No 17/2024

Civil Assistant Surgeon Vacancy 2024

WWW.FREEJOBALERT.COM

Download Mobile App

Application Fee

  • For OC Candidates: Rs. 1000/-
  • For SC, ST, BC, EWS, Differently abled and Ex-servicemen: Rs. 500/-
  • Payment Mode: Through Online

 Important Dates

  • Starting Date for Apply Online : 04-12-2024
  • Last Date to Apply Online & Payment of Fee : 13-12-2024 (11:59 PM)

Age Limit (as on 02-12-2024)

  • Age limit for OC Candidates: 42 Years 
  • Age limit for EWS/SC/ST/BC candidates: 47 Years 
  • Age limit for Differently abled Persons: 52 Years 
  • Age limit for Ex-servicemen: 50 Years 

Qualification

  • For Civil Assistant Surgeon Specialist Posts : PG Diploma/Degree/ DNB
    Concerned Speciality)
  • For Civil Assistant Surgeon (General) Posts : MBBS
  • Registered in A.P. Medical Council.
Vacancy Details
Civil Assistant Surgeon Specialist
Speciality Total
Gynaecology 21
Anaesthesia 10
Paediatrics 06
General Medicine 12
General Surgery 19
Orthopaedics 02
Ophthalmology 05
Radiology 04
Pathology 03
ENT 05
Dermatology 02
Forensic Medicine 02
Psychiatry 02
Civil Assistant Surgeon (General) 04
Interested Candidates Can Read the Full Notification Before Apply Online

FAQs regarding APMSRB Civil Assistant Surgeon 2024

1. What is the starting date to apply online for APMSRB Civil Assistant Surgeon 2024 ?

Ans: Starting Date to apply online is 04-12-2024.

2. What is the last date to apply online for APMSRB Civil Assistant Surgeon 2024 ?

Ans: Last Date for apply online is 13-12-2024.

3. What is the Eligibility to apply for APMSRB Civil Assistant Surgeon 2024?

Ans: MBBS/ PG Diploma/Degree/DNB (Concerned Speciality)

4. How many vacancies are being recruited by APMSRB Civil Assistant Surgeon 2024 ?

Ans: Total 97 Vacancies.

5. How much fee to pay to apply for APMSRB Civil Assistant Surgeon 2024 ?

Ans: For OC Candidates: Rs. 1000/,  For SC, ST, BC, EWS, Differently abled and Ex-servicemen: Rs. 500/-
